communityContent.communityDescription: Ask questions, share your knowledge and get inspired by other users, supporting the whole Flummy environment, of which you are the main beneficiary.

linkedin.title: LinkedIn
linkedin.description: Explore how our company drives innovation and creates exceptional solutions. Connect with us to stay updated on our latest developments and collaboration opportunities.

facebook.title: Facebook
facebook.description: Explore the innovative world of Flummy. We share news, events, and details about our creative solutions. Join the conversation and witness cutting-edge innovation in action.

gitHub.title: GitHub
gitHub.description: Explore the source code behind Flummy's innovative solutions on our GitHub repository. Dive into our projects and contribute to our development. Thank you for being part of our community.

howToFlummyHelpYou: Curious how Flummy can help you? Let’s talk.
footerDescription: Share your business goals with us and get initial advice from one of our expert technology, design and e-commerce consultants. In our commercial team, we specialize in driving your vision and taking your projects to the next level.
